Title.label: Data Package Title
Title.help: The title of your data package

Description.label: Data Package Description
Description.help: A description of your data package

Research_Type.label: Research type
Research_Type.help: Categorize your Research Type - e.g. survey , longitudinal panel, archival etc.

Version.label: Version
Version.help: A version number for the data package

Title.label: Predecessing Data Package
Title.help: Title of the previous version of this data package

Persistent_Identifier.label: Persistent Identifier
Persistent_Identifier.help: Persistent identifier of the previous version of this data package

Persistent_Identifier_Type.label: Type of Persistent Identifier
Persistent_Identifier_Type.help: Type of Persistent identifier of the previous version of this data package

Language.label: Language of the Data
Language.help: The language the data package is in as a iso639-1 two-letter code (e.g. en, nl, fr)

Start_Collection_Date.label: Start Date of Collection Process
Start_Collection_Date.help: Indicate when you've started collecting the data for this data package (YYYY-MM-DD)

End_Collection_Date.label: End Date of Collection Process
End_Collection_Date.help: Indicate when you've finished collecting the data for this data package (YYYY-MM-DD)

Location_Covered.label: Location(s) covered
Location_Covered.help: Indication of the geographical entities, like countries, regions and cities, covered with this data package (English naming convention preferred)

Start_Period.label: Start Period
Start_Period.help: An indication of the start date of the period covered by your data package (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

End_Period.label: End Period
End_Period.help: An indication of the end date of the period covered by your data package (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

Tag.label: Tag(s)
Tag.help: Free text field for adding (searchable) key words to your data package

Retention_Period.label: Retention Period
Retention_Period.help: The minimal number of years the data will be kept in the archive

Retention_Justification.label: Retention Justification
Retention_Justification.help: Provide the reason when you deviate from the minimum of 10 years retention of the data package

Embargo_End_Date.label: Embargo End Date
Embargo_End_Date.help: If there is an embargo on the data package; when will it end?

Publish.label: Publish?
Publish.help: Do you want to have your data package published?

Sensitive.label: Anonymized
Sensitive.help: Is your data package anonymized or pseudo-coded?

Name.label: Funder
Name.help: The name(s) of the organisation(s) funding the research. E.g. NWO

Grant_Number.label: Grant Number
Grant_Number.help: The grant number issued by the funding organisation

Owner.label: Owner Data
Owner.help: The person or organisation owning the data

Name.label: Creator of Data Package
Name.help: The name of the person(s) who created (a version of) the data package. Preferred format: Family Name, First Name

Persistent_Identifier.label: Persistent Identifier
Persistent_Identifier.help: Persistent identifier PI (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, or ScopusID)

Persistent_Identifier_Type.label: Type of Persistent Identifier
Persistent_Identifier_Type.help: What type of persistent person identifier

Affiliation.label: Affiliation
Affiliation.help: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator

Name.label: Contributor(s) to Data Package
Name.help: The name(s) of the persons who have contributed to this data package

Persistent_Identifier.label: Persistent Identifier
Persistent_Identifier.help: Persistent identifier of contributor (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, or ScopusID)

Persistent_Identifier_Type.label: Type of Persistent Identifier
Persistent_Identifier_Type.help: What type of persistent person identifier

Name.label: License
Name.help: The license under which you offer the data package for use by third parties. Preferred value is "CC By 3.0"

URL.label: Link Webpage
URL.help: A link to a webpage describing the license and its conditions. In case of CC By 3.0 'https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/'

Access_Restriction.label: Data Package Access
Access_Restriction.help: Once archived, how is your data package accessible to third parties?
